question.body: What is the normal pathway for action potential conduction through the heart?

multiple_choice.choice: AV node, intermodal pathways, SA node, Bundle of His, Purkinje fibers
Bundle of His, AV node, intermodal pathways, SA node, Purkinje fibers
SA node, intermodal pathways, AV node, Bundle of His, Purkinje fibers
Purkinje fibers, SA node, intermodal pathways, AV node, Bundle of His

response.feedback: Incorrect. Although the pathway starts in a node, it is not the AV node.
Incorrect. The Bundle of His is found in the septum, while the signal starts in the atria.
Correct. Under normal conditions the signals follow this consistent pathway.
Incorrect. The Purkinje fibers are in the ventricles, while the signal starts in the atria.
